channel.title: [317] Delta Help
channel.description:
Okay well I am owner of Swebbyscape. I wanted to add a custom minigame. I wanted to make something that is like the godwars, where u have to kill 15 saradomin wizards in order to go down to the boss. I tried doing this, and i crashed and it erased every account that logged in ftw.... Now i'm just wondering how to do it. I want to add character-JKills = 0 to char files, Also i want to make it so when u kill NPC 1455 (monkey guard) it gives u +1 "Jkill"
Any Help in making this, or a link to a tut would be great, if you want to do yourself, visit my chat box which is at [url=http://xat.com/swebbyscape]xat.com/swebbyscape[/url]
Thank you -Steve :)

item.title: [317] Delta Help
item.dc:creator: @swebbyscape swebbyscape
item.description:
@swebbyscape wrote:

Well, i would but i had to delete right away cause 5 players had already lost their accounts, i had to go to like a week ago backup. So i do not have the pictures but what i did is i took everything that said “saraKills” and right below it copied and paste and changed to Jkills.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Delta Help
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Did you add the character-JKills token? Show us your attempted code first so we can teach you how to improve and fix so then you can learn.

Read full topic
